column5: hi i am looking for the Lowrance iceducer and wondering if anyone knows where i can get one?
LEBARONS radioworld ebay  or Vanselena can make you one for a great price you could pm him, tell him Terry sent you Torpedo Divers 751 Barclay Road London, Ontario Canada N6K1K4
Thanks Terry, always good to see references from happy customers.
thanks terry but checked. and how can he make one?
he has a business that makes them but how? I think it's magic
how do you make them vanselena

I doubt he's gonna share that info fishman.... I got my Lowrance iceducer off ebay last year. I hear they are out of stock directly this year...  One issue using them.. they have a narrower cone than a transom transducer. I'm actually considering going back to my transom trans as the ice one won't mark both jigs in some depths of water..
